EID Brunch At Coral Beach Resort Sharjah
As the Eid festivities are round the corner, Coral Beach Resort Sharjah is all set to roll out the red carpet for the revellers promising festive fete like never before. Since Eid Al Fitr is a day of great merriment and thanksgiving when Muslims gather with friends and family to celebrate over festive feast, the hotel has arranged a lavish brunch at Al Bahar Restaurant on second day of Eid at amazingly affordable prices.
Just for AED125 net per person, the restaurant offers a blend of its signature Arabic fare with Oriental specialties including water, chilled juices and soft drinks. Children below six years of age dine free while children from 6-12 years get 50 per cent discount. Children will also receive Special Gifts.
Mr. Jean Pierre Simon, Regional General Manager, Northern Emirates, Coral Hotels & Resorts, emphasized that the restaurant offers so much in terms of culinary variety that it turns the brunch into a banquet to suit the occasion. The delicious festive brunch will include an assortment of traditional Arabic and international dishes featuring a wide selection of appetizers, soups, main courses. Of course no celebration can be complete without an indulgent selection of dessert and chefs at Al Bahar restaurant will be dishing out the best to give a fitting finale to the brunch. The sheer variety on offer may make it difficult for you to decide where to start from. Our culinary team has been working very hard to surprise the diners with their creativity.‚Äù
